title: Lady and the Tramp: Trailer for live-action Disney+ film shows iconic spaghetti and meatballs scene
text:
The new trailer for Disney+'s Lady and the Tramp shows the iconic scene where the dogs share a plate of spaghetti and meatballs.

The film, which combines live-action with photo-realism, debuted a new look at the streaming service's remake during ABC's Dancing with the Stars on Monday 14 October.

It shows the romantic dinner scene along with the conflict that leads to Lady (voiced by Tessa Thompson) meeting Traump (Justin Theroux).

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

The reboot of the 1955 animated classic will return to the story of pampered house dog Lady and the streetwise Tramp, as they embark on a series of adventures together.
